ygData.subject: Crafted Greaves
ygData.msgSnippet: Who has actually DONE the Crafted Greaves quest? I ve heard different stories on what item you need. Some say the Silver Circlet off Drelzna, some say a
ygData.messageBody:
Who has actually DONE the Crafted Greaves quest? I've heard different
stories on what item you need. Some say the Silver Circlet off Drelzna, some
say a circlet off Najena, and some say one off Trazdon.

I killed Trazdon in Najena last night at got a Dark Circlet (LORE NO DROP
MAGIC ITEM) Necro Only, AC 4, -2 CHA, +4 INT. Is this the correct item
(please only if you have 1st hand knowledge...) It could be a Circlet from
any of them could work....but I dont' wanna take the chance as there is a
couple hours of work (plus two deaths...growl...I hadden't died in 6 ot 7
levels) and 140pp in rubies at stake...heh.

And if this ISN'T the correct circlet, what's this head peice worth?
*chuckle*
Thanks.
